SDRAM_DFII_CONTROL¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x0 = 0xf0002000

Control DFI signals common to all phases

Field

Name

Description

[0]

SEL

Value

Description

0b0

Software (CPU) control.

0b1

Hardware control (default).

[1]

CKE

DFI clock enable bus

[2]

ODT

DFI on-die termination bus

[3]

RESET_N

DFI clock reset bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_COMMAND¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x4 = 0xf0002004

Control DFI signals on a single phase

Field

Name

Description

[0]

CS

DFI chip select bus

[1]

WE

DFI write enable bus

[2]

CAS

DFI column address strobe bus

[3]

RAS

DFI row address strobe bus

[4]

WREN

DFI write data enable bus

[5]

RDEN

DFI read data enable bus

[6]

CS_TOP

DFI chip select bus for top half only

[7]

CS_BOTTOM

DFI chip select bus for bottom half only

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_COMMAND_ISSUE¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x8 = 0xf0002008

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_ADDRESS¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0xc = 0xf000200c

DFI address bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_BADDRESS¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x10 = 0xf0002010

DFI bank address bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_WRDATA¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x14 = 0xf0002014

DFI write data bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI0_RDDATA¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x18 = 0xf0002018

DFI read data bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_COMMAND¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x1c = 0xf000201c

Control DFI signals on a single phase

Field

Name

Description

[0]

CS

DFI chip select bus

[1]

WE

DFI write enable bus

[2]

CAS

DFI column address strobe bus

[3]

RAS

DFI row address strobe bus

[4]

WREN

DFI write data enable bus

[5]

RDEN

DFI read data enable bus

[6]

CS_TOP

DFI chip select bus for top half only

[7]

CS_BOTTOM

DFI chip select bus for bottom half only

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_COMMAND_ISSUE¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x20 = 0xf0002020

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_ADDRESS¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x24 = 0xf0002024

DFI address bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_BADDRESS¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x28 = 0xf0002028

DFI bank address bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_WRDATA¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x2c = 0xf000202c

DFI write data bus

SDRAM_DFII_PI1_RDDATA¶

Address: 0xf0002000 + 0x30 = 0xf0002030

DFI read data bus
